title: Week 17 recap
itunes:title: Week 17 recap
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler – go game-by-game breaking down all the action from the final week of the regular season including the Steelers clinching the final AFC wildcard spot with a win over the Browns, and Peyton Manning returning to the field to lead the Broncos to a victory and #1 playoff seed. Plus, the heroes discuss some of the early coaching shifts already happening across the league.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
